name: Google AI Edge Gallery
tagline: Gallery of on-device ML/GenAI demos to try locally
description: A gallery that showcases on-device ML/GenAI use cases and allows people to try and use models locally.

name: StoryChief
tagline: Paste content and optimize for AI Search automatically
description: Transform your articles for SEO and AI search engines. Optimize content for ChatGPT, Perplexity, Google AI and boost your visibility in AI-powered search results.

name: MoviePong
tagline: The actor–movie game you didn't know you needed
description: MoviePong is a laid-back, browser-based game where you and your friends go back and forth naming actor/movie combos to see who can out-guess each other. Play at your own pace and try not to get ponged. It’s movie trivia for the group chat era.

name: Fundlify
tagline: Crowdfund & pre-sell products on Shopify
description: Fundlify lets you crowdfund, pre-launch, and pre-sell products inside your Shopify store. Launch with confidence, test real demand, and sell only what’s funded—without holding inventory or taking risks. Trusted by modern DTC brands.

name: Glowzy
tagline: Try on clothes and plan your outfit
description: Glowzy revolutionizes how you shop for clothes by bringing the fitting room to your phone. Using advanced AI technology, our app lets you virtually try on any outfit combination and see exactly how it looks on you.

name: CloudMarks
tagline: Your Google Drive, now in your bookmarks bar
description: CloudMarks automatically creates replicas of your Google Drive folders in your bookmarks bar. This allows you to store key websites alongside your Google Drive files and access your Drive content without leaving your current tab.

name: Qovai
tagline: AI product photography for ecommerce store on social media
description: AI product photography for your e-commerce business on social media. Easily generate a product photography using our reference image library, and schedule on social media platform

name: Pryompt
tagline: From idea to optimized AI prompt in one click
description: Transform plain text into professional AI prompts with Pryompt’s powerful toolkit. Generate, optimize, and save prompts for ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini & more. Create blog posts, image prompts, and detailed content effortlessly in seconds.

name: Fluxy AI
tagline: AI Customer Support Agents for SaaS Business
description: FluxyAI is your all-in-one platform for AI-powered workflow automation, integrations, and productivity tools.

name: Bingofy - Music Bingo from Spotify
tagline: A tool to touch grass and create memories. Music and friends
description: 🎵 Generate professional music bingo cards from ANY Spotify playlist instantly! Perfect for bars, parties & events. 600+ games created. Try it FREE now! ⚡

name: Vocaly
tagline: Push-to-Talk Voice Typing - 100% Private
description: 100% private push-to-talk voice typing that works with any application on Windows - browsers, CLI terminals, etc. Press and hold F2, speak, release, and your words appear instantly. Features audio ducking, custom vocabulary, customizable voice commands.

name: Salon Revenue Loss Calculator
tagline: Salon revenue recovery calculator
description: Discover how much revenue your salon is losing from missed rebookings. Calculate your potential with our AI-powered rebooking assistant and start recovering lost revenue in 30 days.

name: MulmoCast Vision
tagline: Business slides, ready in minutes. Just give instructions.
description: MulmoCast Vision is an AI-powered tool that lets you create professional business slides in minutes. Simply give instructions—such as “Make a 20-slide deck about Testa’s innovation strategy”—and MulmoCast Vision instantly generates a polished PDF presentation.

name: AI Workout Generator for Trainers & Gyms
tagline: Generate 4–12 week workouts in seconds
description: AI-Powered Workout Generator

name: Photo to Cartoon
tagline: Cartoonize your photos
description: Cartoonize your photo instantly with PhotoToCartoon.co. Fun, fast, and easy way to create cartoon avatars and portraits online.

name: SaaS Churn Calculator
tagline: Calculate churn & NRR fast – free, no login, 1-click JPG
description: What's your customer and MRR churn? Calculate your churn fast with this free calculator (including retention, net growth rate, GRR, NRR) and generate a nice shareable JPG from the results that you can use for investor updates, standups, or social posts.

name: Epsilab
tagline: Cursor for Quants
description: Transform your trading ideas into sophisticated algorithms using natural language. No coding required, no complex setup needed.

name: CatTrans
tagline: Translator for you and your cat
description: A fun social app for cat lovers that translates your words into cat-friendly sounds. Build a stronger bond with your furry friend, share cute moments with other owners, and explore the playful side of human-cat communication.

name: Face Match Cut Generator
tagline: Upload Photos, Generate Eye-Aligned Animations in Seconds
description: Turn photos into seamless match-cut animations with perfect eye alignment. Upload images, auto-align eyes, and export GIF/MP4 in HD. Runs fully in your browser for speed and privacy — no installs. Perfect for creators, editors and storytellers.

name: KnowFun
tagline: AI-powered learning experience: know in fun.
description: KnowFun is an AI-powered educational application that transforms your documents into interactive, multimodal content. Enjoy personalised learning with aesthetic slides, quizzes, and Q&A—all designed to make knowledge easy to learn for everyone.
